<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/eviSykqSUUw" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
<p>In addition to virtualized shadows, a compute based hierarchical culling system, a software rasterizer, and a host of other techniques, this talk introduces a novel technique for transitioning between LOD levels in a mesh without alpha cross-fading, dithering, or other such methods.</p>
